Nuggets had this problem last year, too: where they lose to sub .500 teams, despite being a good team. I can't figure out where that reoccurring problem comes from in the team's philosophy. Playing down to competition... Idk. Either way, shouldn't make a habit of blowing sizeable leads this late in the season. It reminds me too much of the years when we weren't fully complete, or well enough disciplined to be a real championship pedigree. Hopefully that loss jostles them awake before it's too costly of a mistake.
